select record.order_desc,record.key_name as key_name,record.production_qty,record.id,record.project_no, ifnull(record.real_qty,0) real_qty,ifnull(record.total_qty,0) total_qty,ifnull(p.total_plan_qty,0) total_plan_qty from ( SELECT 'welding_online' key_name,p.id,p.project_no,tmp.real_qty,tmp.total_qty,SUM(p.quantity) production_qty, p.project_name order_desc FROM BMS_NA_PROJECT p LEFT JOIN ( select count(distinct b1.bus_number) real_qty,count(distinct b.bus_number) total_qty,b.project_id from BMS_NA_PROJECT_BUS b left join BMS_NA_PROJECT_BUS b1 on b.id=b1.id
and b1.welding_online > CONCAT(#{start_date},' 00:00:00')
and b1.welding_online <= CONCAT(#{end_date},' 23:59:59')
where b.welding_online != '' group by b.project_id ) tmp ON tmp.project_id=p.id WHERE p.production_plant= #{factory_name} AND p.project_no = #{project_no} GROUP BY p.id
union all SELECT 'welding_offline' key_name,p.id,p.project_no,tmp.real_qty,tmp.total_qty,SUM(p.quantity) production_qty, p.project_name order_desc FROM BMS_NA_PROJECT p LEFT JOIN ( select count(distinct b1.bus_number) real_qty,count(distinct b.bus_number) total_qty,b.project_id from BMS_NA_PROJECT_BUS b left join BMS_NA_PROJECT_BUS b1 on b.id=b1.id
and b1.welding_offline > CONCAT(#{start_date},' 00:00:00')
and b1.welding_offline <= CONCAT(#{end_date},' 23:59:59')
where b.welding_offline != '' group by b.project_id ) tmp ON tmp.project_id=p.id WHERE p.production_plant= #{factory_name} AND p.project_no = #{project_no} GROUP BY p.id

union all SELECT 'chassis_online' key_name,p.id,p.project_no,tmp.real_qty,tmp.total_qty,SUM(p.quantity) production_qty, p.project_name order_desc FROM BMS_NA_PROJECT p LEFT JOIN ( select count(distinct b1.bus_number) real_qty,count(distinct b.bus_number) total_qty,b.project_id from BMS_NA_PROJECT_BUS b left join BMS_NA_PROJECT_BUS b1 on b.id=b1.id

union all SELECT 'assembly_online' key_name,p.id,p.project_no,tmp.real_qty,tmp.total_qty,SUM(p.quantity) production_qty, p.project_name order_desc FROM BMS_NA_PROJECT p LEFT JOIN ( select count(distinct b1.bus_number) real_qty,count(distinct b.bus_number) total_qty,b.project_id from BMS_NA_PROJECT_BUS b left join BMS_NA_PROJECT_BUS b1 on b.id=b1.id

and b1.assembly_online <= CONCAT(#{end_date},' 23:59:59')
where b.assembly_online != '' group by b.project_id ) tmp ON tmp.project_id=p.id WHERE p.production_plant= #{factory_name} AND p.project_no = #{project_no} GROUP BY p.id
union all SELECT 'assembly_offline' key_name,p.id,p.project_no,tmp.real_qty,tmp.total_qty,SUM(p.quantity) production_qty, p.project_name order_desc FROM BMS_NA_PROJECT p LEFT JOIN ( select count(distinct b1.bus_number) real_qty,count(distinct b.bus_number) total_qty,b.project_id from BMS_NA_PROJECT_BUS b left join BMS_NA_PROJECT_BUS b1 on b.id=b1.id
and b1.assembly_offline > CONCAT(#{start_date},' 00:00:00')
and b1.assembly_offline <= CONCAT(#{end_date},' 23:59:59')
where b.assembly_offline != '' group by b.project_id ) tmp ON tmp.project_id=p.id WHERE p.production_plant= #{factory_name} AND p.project_no = #{project_no} GROUP BY p.id
union all SELECT 'warehousing' key_name,p.id,p.project_no,tmp.real_qty,tmp.total_qty,SUM(p.quantity) production_qty, p.project_name order_desc FROM BMS_NA_PROJECT p LEFT JOIN ( select count(distinct b1.bus_number) real_qty,count(distinct b.bus_number) total_qty,b.project_id from BMS_NA_PROJECT_BUS b left join BMS_NA_PROJECT_BUS b1 on b.id=b1.id
and b1.outgoing > CONCAT(#{start_date},' 00:00:00')
and b1.outgoing <= CONCAT(#{end_date},' 23:59:59')
where b.outgoing != '' group by b.project_id ) tmp ON tmp.project_id=p.id WHERE p.production_plant= #{factory_name} AND p.project_no = #{project_no} GROUP BY p.id
) record left join ( SELECT k.key_name,sum(p1.plan_qty) total_plan_qty,p1.project_id AS order_id FROM BMS_NA_PROJECT_PRODUCTION_PLAN p1 LEFT JOIN BMS_NA_BASE_KEY k ON p1.plan_code_value=k.value AND key_code = 'PLAN_CODE' WHERE p1.plant_id=#{factory_id}
and p1.plan_date >=#{start_date}
and p1.plan_date <=#{end_date}
group by p1.project_id,k.key_name ) p on p.key_name=record.key_name and p.order_id=record.id left join BMS_NA_BASE_KEY k on record.key_name=k.key_name WHERE (p.total_plan_qty>0 OR record.real_qty >0)
and record.key_name like concat(#{workshop},'%')
order by record.project_no,cast(k.value as signed)

SELECT k.key_name,p.project_id as order_id,k.value AS plan_code_id,IFNULL(p.plan_qty,0) AS sum_plan_qty ,'0' AS sum_real_qty, '0' AS rate,k.id,k.key_name_en FROM BMS_NA_BASE_KEY k LEFT JOIN BMS_NA_PROJECT_PRODUCTION_PLAN p ON k.value = p.plan_code_value and p.project_id = (SELECT id FROM BMS_NA_PROJECT WHERE project_no = #{order_no}) AND p.plan_date = #{plan_date} WHERE k.key_code = 'PLAN_CODE' AND k.delete_flag = '0' AND k.key_name_en != ''
AND k.key_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{workshop},'%')
GROUP BY k.id ORDER BY k.id
SELECT COUNT(b.id) AS real_qty FROM BMS_NA_PROJECT_BUS b WHERE b.project_id = (SELECT id FROM BMS_NA_PROJECT WHERE project_no = #{order_no}) AND ${workshop} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{plan_date},'%')

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(plan_qty),'0') AS total_month_plan_qty FROM BMS_NA_PROJECT_PRODUCTION_PLAN p WHERE p.project_id = (SELECT id FROM BMS_NA_PROJECT WHERE project_no = #{order_no}) AND p.plan_code_value = #{plan_code_id}
AND p.plan_date LIKE CONCAT('%',#{month},'%')

AND ${workshop} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{month},'%')
AND ${workshop} IS NOT NULL
